PrimaryTransport.TransportTypeData:
<CustomProps>
  <BindingType vt="8">netTcpBinding</BindingType>
  <BindingConfiguration vt="8"><binding name="HttpBinding" closeTimeout="00:01:00" openTimeout="00:01:00" receiveTimeout="00:10:00" sendTimeout="00:01:00" transactionFlow="false" transferMode="Buffered" transactionProtocol="OleTransactions" hostNameComparisonMode="StrongWildcard" listenBacklog="10" maxBufferPoolSize="524288" maxBufferSize="65536" maxConnections="10" maxReceivedMessageSize="65536"><readerQuotas maxDepth="32" maxStringContentLength="8192" maxArrayLength="16384" maxBytesPerRead="4096" maxNameTableCharCount="16384" /><reliableSession ordered="true" inactivityTimeout="00:10:00" enabled="false" /><security mode="None"><transport clientCredentialType="Windows" protectionLevel="EncryptAndSign" /><message clientCredentialType="Windows" /></security></binding></BindingConfiguration>
  <StaticAction vt="8"><BtsActionMapping xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <Operation Name="Test" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/Test" />
  <Operation Name="RegisterStation" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/RegisterStation" />
  <Operation Name="UpdateRegistionInfoStation" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/UpdateRegistionInfoStation" />
  <Operation Name="ActivateStation" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/ActivateStation" />
  <Operation Name="DeactivateStation" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/DeactivateStation" />
  <Operation Name="DeactivateStationByIdentifier" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/DeactivateStationByIdentifier" />
  <Operation Name="SentAlertToStation" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/SentAlertToStation" />
  <Operation Name="SentMessage" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/SentMessage" />
  <Operation Name="GetStationsCollection" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/GetStationsCollection" />
  <Operation Name="InformAboutRaisedAlerts" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/InformAboutRaisedAlerts" />
  <Operation Name="InformAboutUserLoggedIn" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/InformAboutUserLoggedIn" />
  <Operation Name="InformAboutUserLoggedOut" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/InformAboutUserLoggedOut" />
  <Operation Name="ActivatedStation" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/ActivatedStation" />
  <Operation Name="DeactivatedStation" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/DeactivatedStation" />
  <Operation Name="RefreshStation" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/RefreshStation" />
  <Operation Name="RequestMessage" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/RequestMessage" />
  <Operation Name="RaiseAlert" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/RaiseAlert" />
  <Operation Name="UserLoggedIn" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/UserLoggedIn" />
  <Operation Name="UserLoggedOut" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/UserLoggedOut" />
  <Operation Name="IncidentReportRaised" Action="http://2020.AMS/IStationsService/IncidentReportRaised" />
</BtsActionMapping></StaticAction>
  <UseSSO vt="11">0</UseSSO>
  <InboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</InboundBodyLocation>
  <InboundNodeEncoding vt="8">Xml</InboundNodeEncoding>
  <OutboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</OutboundBodyLocation>
  <OutboundXmlTemplate vt="8"><bts-msg-body xmlns="http://www.microsoft.com/schemas/bts2007" encoding="xml"/></OutboundXmlTemplate>
  <PropagateFaultMessage vt="11">-1</PropagateFaultMessage>
  <EnableTransaction vt="11">0</EnableTransaction>
  <IsolationLevel vt="8">Serializable</IsolationLevel>
  <Identity vt="8" />
</CustomProps>
